content.en: Gröbner base computation: Researchers are exploring various questions related to the computation of Gröbner bases in different types of algebraic structures. They are investigating the applications of Gröbner bases in both commutative and noncommutative algebras, as well as exploring how to compute Gröbner bases for specific types of polynomial ideals. Algorithms are being developed to address these research questions and improve the computation of Gröbner bases in different contexts, such as polynomial rings over a ring or orders of algebraic number fields.
content.da: Gröbner base beregning: Forskere undersøger forskellige spørgsmål relateret til beregning af Gröbner baser i forskellige typer algebraiske strukturer. De undersøger anvendelserne af Gröbner baser i både kommutative og ikke-kommutative algebraer samt udforsker, hvordan man beregner Gröbner baser for specifikke typer af polynomialidealer. Algoritmer udvikles for at adressere disse forskningsspørgsmål og forbedre beregningen af Gröbner baser i forskellige sammenhænge, såsom polynomialringe over en ring eller ordrer af algebraiske talfelter.
